T02D3699:330b-1: shr'i badzra sva ra sva t'i de w'i no pi kam /
T02D3699:330b-3: dpal lha mo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3699:330b-4: rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3699:330b-5: gangs ri ltar dkar zla rgyas zhal mnga' dri med bsil zhing gsal ba'i 'od zer phreng ba can //
T02D3699:330b-6: sgeg chags 'gying dul 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar lha yi lha mo kun nas mdzes pa'i gzi ldan ma //
T02D3699:330b-7: stong phrag drug cu'i yan lag dbyangs snyan rgyud mangs rol mo autpal ral gris phyag mtshan cing ;
T02D3699:330b-8: /'jig rten gsum skyabs mkha' dang rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyur
T02D3699:330b-9: blo gros lha mo rgyal gyur cig / pha rol
T02D3699:330b-11: mtha' yas spobs pa kun bskyed dang //
T02D3699:330b-12: sna tshogs phrin las bde bsgrub phyir //
T02D3699:330b-13: dbyangs can lha mo bsgrub par bya //
T02D3699:330b-14: 'phags ma de rtag mgon bzung nas //
T02D3699:330b-15: 'gro skyabs don kun myur brtson pas //
T02D3699:330b-16: sman ljongs rab dgar brag rir ni //
T02D3699:330b-17: rnam g-yeng spangs te tshogs bsag dang //
T02D3699:330b-18: dus snyigs bar chad kun bsal phyir //
T02D3699:330b-19: sngon du sngags pas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D3699:330b-20: mnyes byas de rjes snying rje'i yid //
T02D3699:331a-2: sngags bdag nga rgyal la brtan srog / rtsa ba'i yi ge sgron 'dra yi //
T02D3699:331a-3: zer spros nas ni rgya mtsho nas //
T02D3699:331a-4: dbyangs can 'khor lo mdun du dgug / aom ae
T02D3699:331a-5: hye hi badzra de w'i ma h'a tsakra sa ma
T02D3699:331a-6: ya stvam sa ma ya dza:/
T02D3699:331a-7: gzhal med srog gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D3699:331a-10: mkha' ltar zla rgyas ltar drangs te //
T02D3699:331a-11: rab dang kun dags khrus sogs dbul //
T02D3699:331a-12: me tog bdug pa mar me dri //
T02D3699:331a-13: zhal zas rol mo rgyan phreng dag / pi wang lhan cig sngags bcas mchod //
T02D3699:331a-14: 'bru gsum glu gar ldan byas bstod //
T02D3699:331a-15: phyag mchod la sogs rgyud kun gyis //
T02D3699:331a-16: mnyes bya gsol bya bstim par bya //
T02D3699:331a-17: gnas la gnas dang lus la sku //
T02D3699:331a-18: snying dkyil 'khor lo phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D3699:331a-19: shel dang beed'ur r'a ga dang //
T02D3699:331a-20: gser bzang las grub gzhal yas khang //
T02D3699:331a-21: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs mdzes //
T02D3699:331a-22: sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis spras //
T02D3699:331a-23: de dbus rdo rje lha mo ni //
T02D3699:331a-24: pad zla rdo rje skyil krung mnan //
T02D3699:331a-25: brgyad gnyis na tshod yid 'ong ma //
T02D3699:331a-26: 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs med pa'o //
T02D3699:331a-27: de sku ldem sgeg zhal 'dzum phyag / bzhi ldan ral gri autpal dang //
T02D3699:331a-28: rgyud mangs pi wang sbreng mdzad brtson //
T02D3699:331a-29: nyi shar gangs ri ltar dkar blta //
T02D3699:331a-30: thugs kar rab dkar shes rab kyi //
T02D3699:331a-31: snying po dkar mdzes hr'im yig gi //
T02D3699:331a-33: bum nang sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin //
T02D3699:331a-34: sprin med mkha' dkyil zla skar ltar //
T02D3699:331a-36: rim pas dbus nas mthar snang bya //
T02D3699:331a-37: nyi zer kha phye pad 'dab tshul //
T02D3699:331a-39: dbus bzhugs bzhi gnyis kha phye nas //
T02D3699:331a-40: gnyis gnyis nga ro bcu drug rgyas //
T02D3699:331a-41: de spros ge sar ze'u 'bru phye //
T02D3699:331a-43: slar yang bdud rtsi'i zil mngar blang //
T02D3699:331a-44: dkar 'jam snum mnyen mkhregs dang srab //
T02D3699:331a-45: yid 'ong dri mas ma gos pa'o //
T02D3699:331a-46: zil mngar snying gi mun sel la //
T02D3699:331a-47: snying 'dab snying pos slar yang de'i //
T02D3699:331a-48: zil mngar rgyas byed yang tshur 'od //
T02D3699:331a-49: rab spros phyi nang kun dag byed //
T02D3699:331b-0: ji srid ma yengs mi @331b skyo bar ;
T02D3699:331b-1: / bdag gzhan mkha' khyab kun bkang la //
T02D3699:331b-2: sdig sdug yid kyi mun pa rnams //
T02D3699:331b-3: nyi mas mun bsal ji bzhin no //
T02D3699:331b-4: rtsa ba'i yi ge mchog gcig la //
T02D3699:331b-5: g-yeng med 'bum phrag bco lnga bzlas //
T02D3699:331b-6: dngos dang rmi lam brda gzugs kyi //
T02D3699:331b-7: ltas gsum phyi rol mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D3699:331b-9: dbyangs yig ral gri phyed mtshan par //
T02D3699:331b-10: skad cig rnam pas bsgyur zhing bskor //
T02D3699:331b-11: gsang sngags 'bum phrag bzlas par bya //
T02D3699:331b-12: aom badzra de w'i bi tsu pi tsu pra dzny'a bardha hr'im h'um /
T02D3699:331b-13: rang snying mun sel brtan pa dang //
T02D3699:331b-14: gzhan yid mun sel g-yo ba yis //
T02D3699:331b-15: 'bum phrag gsum ni rtse gcig bzlas //
T02D3699:331b-16: lkugs pa 'ang ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyur //
T02D3699:331b-17: nang skye zla rgyas pa wa sangs //
T02D3699:331b-18: gsung ba sgron ma 'bar ba mthong //
T02D3699:331b-19: brda gsum gzugs sgra yid shes te /
T02D3699:331b-20: mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtags gzhan yin //
T02D3699:331b-21: de la sbyin sreg sngon song bas //
T02D3699:331b-22: brgya rtsa brgyad mchod blo gros spel //
T02D3699:331b-23: de yis tshar gcad rjes gzung las //
T02D3699:331b-24: lnga phrag gnyis 'grub the tshom med //
T02D3699:331b-25: rtsod dang dgra 'dul dug gzhil dang //
T02D3699:331b-26: 'chi bdag bzlog pa dang po ste //
T02D3699:331b-27: blo gros sngags rig snyan dngags dang //
T02D3699:331b-28: klog dang sngags 'grub gnyis pa yin //
T02D3699:331b-29: yang na thog ma gnyis rtse mos //
T02D3699:331b-30: lhag ma bzhi bzhi lha mo gzhan //
T02D3699:331b-32: de bzhin gnyis gtso gzhan brgyad 'khor //
T02D3699:331b-33: rdo rje lha mo la gnas lce //
T02D3699:331b-34: 'khor la dbyangs ldan ral gri bskor //
T02D3699:331b-35: pha rol srog dang lce bskum nas //
T02D3699:331b-36: gsal byed mgrin bkang rtsod las rgyal //
T02D3699:331b-37: mtshan ngan thod pa dgra bo'i gzugs //
T02D3699:331b-38: m'a ra ya nan la 'bum bzlas //
T02D3699:331b-39: gri mtshon gyis gtubs ro ras dkris //
T02D3699:331b-41: lhag pa'i lhas brgyan lha mo nyid //
T02D3699:331b-42: khro mo zhal brgya phrag stong can //
T02D3699:331b-43: lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri yis //
T02D3699:331b-44: bkug cing bsnun na shin tu 'joms //
T02D3699:331b-45: dam tshig lha mos ye shes kyi //
T02D3699:331b-46: lha drangs bum par bdud rtsi bsgrub //
T02D3699:331b-47: smin mtshams padmo'i hr'im thig le //
T02D3699:332a-2: snying dkyil srog yig rin chen sgron //
T02D3699:332a-4: aa phreng ka phreng spel bskor gzigs //
T02D3699:332a-6: ji skad sngar bshad lha mo nyid //
T02D3699:332a-7: de bzhin lha mo lnga lnga dgu //
T02D3699:332a-8: sna gsum bdag gi snying la bsgom //
T02D3699:332a-9: blo gros rab 'phel gdon mi za //
T02D3699:332a-10: dpal mo'i mgrin par chu skyes dbus //
T02D3699:332a-11: dung dkar g-yas 'khyil sbubs ltar ba //
T02D3699:332a-12: nga ro bcu drug gsang bstod sgrogs //
T02D3699:332a-13: de myur tshangs dbyangs ngag thob 'gyur //
T02D3699:332a-14: gtsang zhing rab gtsang pad snying dbus //
T02D3699:332a-15: gzha' ris dpal be'u 'od zer gsal //
T02D3699:332a-16: glog phreng rgyun 'dra rdo rje'i lce //
T02D3699:332a-18: 'dam skyes ri bong rdo rje yis //
T02D3699:332a-19: sbyor bas lce rtser tshangs yid bskyed //
T02D3699:332a-20: lha mo'i ljags skyes rdo rje ltung //
T02D3699:332a-21: de blangs ka la ping ga mtshungs //
T02D3699:332a-22: rje btsun ljags pad zla steng du //
T02D3699:332a-23: dbyangs gsal rdo rje ral gris mtshan //
T02D3699:332a-24: bro gar 'gyur bklags ye shes bkug / de rgyun sus 'thungs 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D3699:332a-25: thun mtshams gtsang zhing rab dkar zas //
T02D3699:332a-26: mngar bsil sna tshogs btung bar byas //
T02D3699:332a-27: 'bru gsum rang sngags byin brlabs la //
T02D3699:332a-28: bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3699:332a-29: aom a'a:badzri shr'i de w'is pa ri w'ar aa mri te ba lim ta kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3699:332a-30: ma ma sarba siddhi h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3699:332a-31: 'jam dbyangs lha mo dbyangs snyan ma //
T02D3699:332a-32: rab mdzes tshangs dbyangs blo bzangs ma //
T02D3699:332a-33: mtshungs med snying dbus mgrin skyong ma //
T02D3699:332a-35: bde ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ma //
T02D3699:332a-37: bag yod yid 'ong nor ster ma //
T02D3699:332a-38: tshangs spyod tshangs rigs ma khyod 'dud //
T02D3699:332a-39: dpal ldan dbyangs can brtag pa'i de nyid rgya mtsho
T02D3699:332a-40: mkha' dang gter ltar zab cing rgya che sbas pa
T02D3699:332a-41: las // rdo rje lha mo ri dbang phung po
T02D3699:332a-42: sangs rgyas khang bzangs lnga phrag gnyis sgrub nyes tshogs
T02D3699:332a-44: zla zer bsil bas ku mud ltar phye de yi
T02D3699:332a-45: lam nas dge 'od rin chen 'bar ba'i sgron mthus
T02D3699:332a-46: gang thob des // ma lus lus can rdo rje
T02D3699:332a-47: lha mo'i dbyangs snyan myur thob tshangs chen nga ros
T02D3699:332a-48: sa gsum rnam par rol bar shog / dpal rdo
T02D3699:332a-49: rje dbyangs snyan ma'i sgrub thabs snyan ngag mkhan chen
T02D3699:332b-0: po slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa @332b
T02D3699:332b-2: / rnam par bshad pa'i pandi ta mkhas pa chen po buddha shr'i dzny'a na dang /
